Article.ArticleTitle: Long covid: risk factors, outcomes, and future directions for research.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Diabetes Research Centre, University of Leicester, Leicester, UK.
Diabetes Research Centre, University of Leicester, Leicester, UK.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Competing interests: We have read and understood the BMJ policy on declaration of interests and declare the following interests: KK is chair of the ethnicity subgroup of the UK Scientific Advisory Group for Emergencies (SAGE), member of SAGE, and also chair of the National Long Covid Study Group that reports to the chief medical officer of England.
